subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Shopping and Retail
Shopping Centers and Malls
lead_paragraph: Westfield Stratford City in east London has over 300 stores, including Prada and Apple, presenting contrasts to its depressed neighborhood and ideals of amateurism.
